name: Project Boost (itch) (aremdisi)
description:
A casual single player game that uses rocket as the player. The rocket needs to reach the end platform to unlock the next level.
The player is given ten attempts to finish all five levels, and the game will be considered clear if all levels are unlocked. First time clearing the game will give five additional attempts for fun. However, if the number of attempts went zero, all data will reset, that will result to game over.

This game(also the sounds and particles used) is based from the first course of  "Udemy Complete C# Unity Game Developer 3D by  Gamedev.tv", with additional mechanics and changes.

Enjoy!

Default Keys:(Can be changed in Key binds under Settings)

Esc  - Exit game
A, D - to maneuver to left or right
Space - for engine thrust
